title: OX Ottoman Premium Leather/Dark Tan
body: If you already have the OX Chair and is satisfied with the comfort it brings, imagine how much more comfort you’ll have if you compliment it with OX Ottoman. Since its birth in 1960, Ox Chair and OX Ottoman has been an obvious iconic item on the list of furniture must-haves. A striking design with a large support and supportive seat base is what makes the OX Ottoman a perfect comfortable and striking modern lounge chair. Whether used with the partner OX Chair or a stand-alone chair, this chair makes for an amazing investment with an added talking point for all your visitors and friends.
